00013 
00014 Lgm_Eop *Lgm_init_eop( int Verbose ) {
00015 
00016     Lgm_Eop      *e;
00017     long int      days;
00018     double        cJD;
00019     Lgm_CTrans   *c = Lgm_init_ctrans(0);
00020 
00021     e = (Lgm_Eop *) calloc (1, sizeof(*e));
00022 
00023     e->Verbosity = Verbose;
00024 
00025     /*
00026      *  Guess roughly how many values we need to calloc. The data goes from
00027      *  1962->now+1year or so.
00028      */
00029     cJD    = Lgm_GetCurrentJD( c );
00030     days = (long int)(cJD-JD1962+400.5);
00031     
00032     e->Size     = days; // size of arrays
00033     e->nEopVals = 0;    // number of values stored in arrays
00034     e->Date = (long int *)calloc( days, sizeof(long int) );
00035     e->MJD  = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00036     e->xp   = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00037     e->yp   = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00038     e->DUT1 = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00039     e->LOD  = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00040     e->dPsi = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00041     e->dEps = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00042     e->dX   = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00043     e->dY   = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00044     e->DAT  = (double *)calloc( days, sizeof(double) );
00045 
00046     Lgm_free_ctrans( c );
00047 
00048     return e;
00049 
00050 }
00051 
00052 void  Lgm_destroy_eop( Lgm_Eop *e ) {
00053 
00054     // first free arrays inside structure
00055     free( e->Date );
00056     free( e->MJD );
00057     free( e->xp );
00058     free( e->yp );
00059     free( e->DUT1 );
00060     free( e->LOD );
00061     free( e->dPsi );
00062     free( e->dEps );
00063     free( e->dX );
00064     free( e->dY );
00065     free( e->DAT );
00066 
00067     // tehn free structure itself
00068     free( e );
00069 
00070     return;
00071     
00072 }

00075 void Lgm_read_eop( Lgm_Eop *e ) {
00076 
00077     FILE        *fp;
00078     long int    n, N;
00079     char        *Line, *Filename;
00080 
00081     Filename = (char *)calloc( 512, sizeof(char) );
00082     sprintf( Filename, "%s/LgmEop.dat", LGM_EOP_DATA_DIR );
00083     if ( (fp = fopen( Filename, "r" )) != NULL ) {
00084 
00085         Line = (char *)calloc( 260, sizeof(char) );
00086         while( fgets( Line, 256, fp ) != NULL ) {
00087             if ( Line[0] != '#' ) {
00088                 n = e->nEopVals;
00089                 N = e->Size;
00090                 if ( n == N ) {
00091                     // Out array sizes need to be increased  (try adding another years worth)
00092                     N += 365;
00093                     e->Date = realloc( e->Date, N );
00094                     e->MJD  = realloc( e->MJD, N );
00095                     e->xp   = realloc( e->xp, N );
00096                     e->yp   = realloc( e->yp, N );
00097                     e->DUT1 = realloc( e->DUT1, N );
00098                     e->LOD  = realloc( e->LOD, N );
00099                     e->dPsi = realloc( e->dPsi, N );
00100                     e->dEps = realloc( e->dEps, N );
00101                     e->dX   = realloc( e->dX, N );
00102                     e->dY   = realloc( e->dY, N );
00103                     e->DAT  = realloc( e->DAT, N );
00104                     e->Size = N;
00105                 }
00106                 sscanf( Line, "%ld %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf %lf", &e->Date[n], &e->MJD[n], &e->xp[n],
00107                     &e->yp[n], &e->DUT1[n], &e->LOD[n], &e->dPsi[n], &e->dEps[n], &e->dX[n], &e->dY[n], &e->DAT[n]);
00108                 ++(e->nEopVals);
00109             }
00110         }
00111         free(Filename);
00112         free(Line);
00113         fclose( fp );
00114 
00115     } else {
00116         printf("Cannot open LgmEop.dat file\n");
00117     }
00118 
00119 }

00122 void Lgm_get_eop_at_JD( double JD, Lgm_EopOne *eop, Lgm_Eop *e ) { 
00123      
00124     long int            q, ql, qh, t;
00125     int                 nq, i, ny, nm, nd;
00126     double              *x, *y, MJD, UTC;
00127     gsl_interp_accel    *acc;
00128     gsl_spline          *spline;
00129 
00130     MJD = JD - 2400000.5;
00131     eop->JD   = JD;
00132     eop->MJD  = MJD;
00133     eop->Date = Lgm_JD_to_Date( JD, &ny, &nm, &nd, &UTC );
00134     eop->UTC  = UTC;
00135 
00136     if (e->nEopVals < 3) {
00137 
00138         printf("Not enough EOP values to interpolate\n");
00139         eop->DUT1 = 0.0;
00140         eop->xp   = 0.0;
00141         eop->yp   = 0.0;
00142         eop->dPsi = 0.0;
00143         eop->dEps = 0.0;
00144         eop->LOD  = 0.0;
00145         eop->dX   = 0.0;
00146         eop->dY   = 0.0;
00147 
00148     } else {
00149 
00150         q = (int)( JD-JD1962 ); // approximate index where JD is found in the LgmEop.dat file
00151         ql = q-7; // set low index to -7days
00152         qh = q+7; // set high index to +7days
00153         if (ql < 0 ) ql = 0;
00154         if (qh >= e->nEopVals ) qh = e->nEopVals;
00155         nq = qh-ql+1;
00156         x = (double *)calloc( nq, sizeof(double) );
00157         y = (double *)calloc( nq, sizeof(double) );
00158 
00159         acc    = gsl_interp_accel_alloc( );
00160         spline = gsl_spline_alloc( gsl_interp_cspline, nq );
00161 
00162 
00163         
00164 
00165         // interpolate xp
00166         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->xp[t]; }
00167         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->xp = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00168 
00169         // interpolate yp
00170         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->yp[t]; }
00171         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->yp = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00172 
00173         // interpolate DUT1
00174         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->DUT1[t]; }
00175         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->DUT1 = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00176 
00177         // interpolate LOD
00178         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->LOD[t]; }
00179         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->LOD = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00180         
00181         // interpolate dPsi
00182         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->dPsi[t]; }
00183         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->dPsi = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00184         
00185         // interpolate dEps
00186         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->dEps[t]; }
00187         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->dEps = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00188         
00189         // interpolate dX
00190         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->dX[t]; }
00191         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->dX = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00192 
00193         // interpolate dY
00194         for ( i=0, t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ x[i] = e->MJD[t]; y[i++] = e->dY[t]; }
00195         gsl_spline_init (spline, x, y, nq); eop->dY = gsl_spline_eval( spline, MJD, acc );
00196 
00197         // set DAT
00198         for ( t=ql; t<=qh; t++ ){ 
00199             if ( MJD <= e->MJD[t] ) {
00200                 eop->DAT = e->DAT[t];
00201                 break;
00202             }
00203         }
00204 
00205         // Some of the values may end up being zero if they are in the future
00206         // and no prediction was given for them. Its probably better to just
00207         // pin the value at the last real prediction that was made?
00208         
00209 
00210 
00211 
00212 
00213         free(x);
00214         free(y);
00215         gsl_spline_free (spline);
00216         gsl_interp_accel_free (acc);
00217 
00218     }
00219 
00220     if ( e->Verbosity > 0 ) {
00221         printf("\n");
00222         printf("    Earth Orientation Parameters\n");
00223         printf("    ----------------------------\n");
00224         printf("      Date   = %8ld\n", eop->Date );
00225         printf("        JD   = %11.7lf\n", eop->JD );
00226         printf("       MJD   = %11.7lf\n", eop->MJD );
00227         printf("       UTC   = %11.7lf  ( ", eop->UTC );     Lgm_Print_HMSd( UTC ); printf(" )\n");
00228         printf("        xp   = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->xp );
00229         printf("        yp   = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->yp );
00230         printf("        DUT1 = %11.7lf s\n", eop->DUT1 );
00231         printf("        LOD  = %11.7lf s\n", eop->LOD );
00232         printf("        dPsi = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->dPsi);
00233         printf("        dEps = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->dEps);
00234         printf("        dX   = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->dX );
00235         printf("        dY   = %11.7lf \u2033\n", eop->dY );
00236         printf("        DAT  = %11.7lf s\n", eop->DAT );
00237         printf("\n");
00238     }
00239 
00240 
00241 
00242         
00243     
00244 
00245 
00246 
00247 }

00249 void Lgm_set_eop( Lgm_EopOne *eop, Lgm_CTrans *c ) { 
00250     c->DUT1 = eop->DUT1;
00251     c->DAT  = eop->DAT;
00252     c->xp   = eop->xp;
00253     c->yp   = eop->yp;
00254     c->dPsi = eop->dPsi;
00255     c->dEps = eop->dEps;
00256     c->LOD  = eop->LOD;
00257     c->dX   = eop->dX;
00258     c->dY   = eop->dY;
00259 }
00260 
00261 void Lgm_unset_eop( Lgm_EopOne *eop, Lgm_CTrans *c ) { 
00262     //c->DAT  = eop->DAT; dont unset these ones
00263     c->DUT1 = 0.0;
00264     c->xp   = 0.0;
00265     c->yp   = 0.0;
00266     c->dPsi = 0.0;
00267     c->dEps = 0.0;
00268     c->LOD  = 0.0;
00269     c->dX   = 0.0;
00270     c->dY   = 0.0;
00271 }

00273 
00274 
00275 
00276 /*
00277  * Use the NGA (National Geospatial Intelligence Agency) EP precition
00278  * polynomials to predict xp, yp, DUT1
00279  *
00280  *  JD -- Time to predict quantities for (in JD)
00281  *
00282  */
00283 void Lgm_NgaEoppPred( double JD, Lgm_EopOne *eop, Lgm_NgaEopp *e ){
00284 
00285 
00286     double  t, tmta, tmtb; 
00287 
00288     t    = JD - 2400000.5; // the t in the model is in MJD
00289     tmta = t - e->ta;
00290     tmtb = t - e->tb;
00291 
00292 
00293     eop->xp   = e->A + e->B * tmta 
00294                 + e->C1*sin( M_2PI*tmta/e->P1 ) + e->C2*sin( M_2PI*tmta/e->P2 )
00295                 + e->D1*cos( M_2PI*tmta/e->P1 ) + e->D2*cos( M_2PI*tmta/e->P2 );
00296 
00297     eop->yp   = e->E + e->F * tmta 
00298                 + e->G1*sin( M_2PI*tmta/e->Q1 ) + e->G2*sin( M_2PI*tmta/e->Q2 )
00299                 + e->H1*cos( M_2PI*tmta/e->Q1 ) + e->H2*cos( M_2PI*tmta/e->Q2 );
00300 
00301     eop->DUT1 = e->I + e->J * tmtb 
00302                 + e->K1*sin( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R1 ) + e->K2*sin( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R2 )
00303                 + e->K3*sin( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R3 ) + e->K4*sin( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R4 )
00304                 + e->L1*cos( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R1 ) + e->L2*cos( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R2 )
00305                 + e->L3*cos( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R3 ) + e->L4*cos( M_2PI*tmtb/e->R4 );
00306 
00307 }
00308 
00309 
00310 int Lgm_ReadNgaEopp( Lgm_NgaEopp *e, int Verbosity ) {
00311 
00312     int     y, m, d;
00313     double  UTC;
00314     char    *Line, Word[11];
00315     char    *Filename;
00316     FILE    *fp;
00317 
00318     Filename = (char *)calloc( 512, sizeof(char) );
00319     sprintf( Filename, "%s/LgmNgaEopp.dat", LGM_EOP_DATA_DIR );
00320 //    strcpy( Filename, "/home/mgh/DREAM/Dream/libLanlGeoMag/EopData/LgmNgaEopp.dat" );
00321 
00322     if ( (fp = fopen( Filename, "r" )) == NULL ) {
00323         printf( "Coulndt open file %s\n", Filename );
00324         free( Filename );
00325         return(0);
00326     }
00327     free( Filename );
00328 
00329 
00330     Line     = (char *)calloc( 5000, sizeof(char) );
00331 
00332     fgets( Line, 4096, fp );
00333     strncpy(Word, Line +  0, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->ta = atof( Word );
00334     strncpy(Word, Line + 10, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->A  = atof( Word );
00335     strncpy(Word, Line + 20, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->B  = atof( Word );
00336     strncpy(Word, Line + 30, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->C1 = atof( Word );
00337     strncpy(Word, Line + 40, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->C2 = atof( Word );
00338     strncpy(Word, Line + 50, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->D1 = atof( Word );
00339     strncpy(Word, Line + 60, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->D2 = atof( Word );
00340     strncpy(Word, Line + 70,  6); Word[6]  = '\0'; e->P1 = atof( Word );
00341 
00342 
00343     fgets( Line, 4096, fp );
00344     strncpy(Word, Line +  0,  6); Word[6]  = '\0'; e->P2 = atof( Word );
00345     strncpy(Word, Line +  6, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->E  = atof( Word );
00346     strncpy(Word, Line + 16, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->F  = atof( Word );
00347     strncpy(Word, Line + 26, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->G1 = atof( Word );
00348     strncpy(Word, Line + 36, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->G2 = atof( Word );
00349     strncpy(Word, Line + 46, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->H1 = atof( Word );
00350     strncpy(Word, Line + 56, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->H2 = atof( Word );
00351     strncpy(Word, Line + 66,  6); Word[6]  = '\0'; e->Q1 = atof( Word );
00352     strncpy(Word, Line + 72,  6); Word[6]  = '\0'; e->Q2 = atof( Word );
00353 
00354 
00355     fgets( Line, 4096, fp );
00356     strncpy(Word, Line +  0, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->tb = atof( Word );
00357     strncpy(Word, Line + 10, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->I  = atof( Word );
00358     strncpy(Word, Line + 20, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->J  = atof( Word );
00359     strncpy(Word, Line + 30, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->K1 = atof( Word );
00360     strncpy(Word, Line + 40, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->K2 = atof( Word );
00361     strncpy(Word, Line + 50, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->K3 = atof( Word );
00362     strncpy(Word, Line + 60, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->K4 = atof( Word );
00363 
00364     
00365     fgets( Line, 4096, fp );
00366     strncpy(Word, Line +  0, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->L1 = atof( Word );
00367     strncpy(Word, Line + 10, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->L2 = atof( Word );
00368     strncpy(Word, Line + 20, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->L3 = atof( Word );
00369     strncpy(Word, Line + 30, 10); Word[10] = '\0'; e->L4 = atof( Word );
00370     strncpy(Word, Line + 40,  9); Word[9]  = '\0'; e->R1 = atof( Word );
00371     strncpy(Word, Line + 49,  9); Word[9]  = '\0'; e->R2 = atof( Word );
00372     strncpy(Word, Line + 58,  9); Word[9]  = '\0'; e->R3 = atof( Word );
00373     strncpy(Word, Line + 67,  9); Word[9]  = '\0'; e->R4 = atof( Word );
00374 
00375     fgets( Line, 4096, fp );
00376     strncpy(Word, Line +  0, 4); Word[4] = '\0'; e->dat    = atoi( Word );
00377     strncpy(Word, Line +  4, 5); Word[5] = '\0'; e->EOPPWk = atoi( Word );
00378     strncpy(Word, Line +  9, 6); Word[6] = '\0'; e->teff   = atoi( Word );
00379 
00380     free( Line );
00381     fclose( fp );
00382 
00383 
00384     /* 
00385      *  Print out what we read for debugging purposes
00386      */
00387     if ( Verbosity > 0 ) {
00388 
00389         printf("    ta:    %10.2lf\n", e->ta);
00390         Lgm_MJD_to_Date( e->ta, &y, &m, &d, &UTC);
00391         printf("         %4d %2d %2d %lf\n", y, m, d, UTC);
00392         printf("     A:    %10.6lf\n", e->A);
00393         printf("     B:    %10.6lf\n", e->B);
00394         printf("    C1:    %10.6lf\n", e->C1);
00395         printf("    C2:    %10.6lf\n", e->C2);
00396         printf("    D1:    %10.6lf\n", e->D1);
00397         printf("    D2:    %10.6lf\n", e->D2);
00398         printf("    P1:    %6.2lf\n",  e->P1);
00399         printf("    P2:    %6.2lf\n",  e->P2);
00400         printf("     E:    %10.6lf\n", e->E);
00401         printf("     F:    %10.6lf\n", e->F);
00402         printf("    G1:    %10.6lf\n", e->G1);
00403         printf("    G2:    %10.6lf\n", e->G2);
00404         printf("    H1:    %10.6lf\n", e->H1);
00405         printf("    H2:    %10.6lf\n", e->H2);
00406         printf("    Q1:    %6.2lf\n",  e->Q1);
00407         printf("    Q2:    %6.2lf\n",  e->Q2);
00408 
00409         printf("    tb:    %10.2lf\n", e->tb);
00410         Lgm_MJD_to_Date( e->tb, &y, &m, &d, &UTC);
00411         printf("         %4d %2d %2d %lf\n", y, m, d, UTC);
00412         printf("     I:    %10.6lf\n", e->I);
00413         printf("     J:    %10.6lf\n", e->J);
00414         printf("    K1:    %10.6lf\n", e->K1);
00415         printf("    K2:    %10.6lf\n", e->K2);
00416         printf("    K3:    %10.6lf\n", e->K3);
00417         printf("    K4:    %10.6lf\n", e->K4);
00418         printf("    L1:    %10.6lf\n", e->L1);
00419         printf("    L2:    %10.6lf\n", e->L2);
00420         printf("    L3:    %10.6lf\n", e->L3);
00421         printf("    L4:    %10.6lf\n", e->L4);
00422         printf("    R1:    %9.4lf\n",  e->R1);
00423         printf("    R2:    %9.4lf\n",  e->R2);
00424         printf("    R3:    %9.4lf\n",  e->R3);
00425         printf("    R4:    %9.4lf\n",  e->R4);
00426         printf("   dat:    %4d\n",     e->dat);
00427         printf("EOPPWk:    %5d\n",     e->EOPPWk);
00428         printf("  teff:    %6d\n",     e->teff);
00429         Lgm_MJD_to_Date( (double)(e->teff), &y, &m, &d, &UTC);
00430         printf("         %4d %2d %2d %lf\n", y, m, d, UTC);
00431 
00432     }
00433 
00434     return(1);
